channel.title: Media on MST Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Media on MST Lab

item.title: Interview on Newstalk
item.description: Coincidences do happen. But what do they mean to us and just what are the chances? In this special feature episode, we find out… This was fun to take part in! Futureproof is a science programme on Newstalk hosted by @jonathan_mccrea. A special issue on Chance and Coincidence was recorded with input from Prof. Brian Hughes (@b_m_hughes (Professor of Psychology at the National University of Ireland, Galway ) and I.
